heading.title: ¿What is the Leht?
heading.text: The World's first eco-friendly currency valued according to the digital identity.

value.title: Leht's value
value.head: The Leht is the Value of Digital Identity (VID for its acronym in Spanish)
value.text: The Leht is the first eco-friendly currency backed by the value of personal data. On FySelf your online life takes value.

mining.title: Universal Digital Eco-friendly Currency
mining.text: On FySelf you earn Leht from the moment you activate your wallet. Identity data and online services are the gold that supports the value of "your digital self".

ecom.title: What is mining?
ecom.text: Bring your daily web activity to FySelf, post, socialize and validate information to add points to your digital reputation. Notify now your community, companies, businesses and institutions and you will start receiving economic benefits.

environment.title: Protects the environment
environment.text: The Leht doesn't require energy costs or equipment investments. It is a "Clean Mining" based on performing simple actions such as posting, chatting, completing and conducting surveys.

decentralized.title: Decentralized
decentralized.text: The Leht operates in the style of a cryptocurrency due to its decentralized nature. This enables fast and secure transfers between individuals and/or institutions, without the mediation of banks or governments and the costs that this implies.

energy.title: Doesn't consume energy
energy.text: Cryptocurrencies base their mining system on complex computer calculations demanding large investments in equipment and energy. The Leht bases its mining on the amount of information provided and validated by users, within the Fyself ecosystem of platforms and applications.

footer.text: FySelf is the First Social Network where you can mine an eco-friendly currency called Leht, the first cryptocurrency backed by the value of personal data. On FySelf, people take back control of their personal data.
footer.partner: Be part of FySelf: become a partner

join: Join this novelty and create your account now.
